import React from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; export const Login: React.FC = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data: any) => console.log(data); console.log(watch("example")); // watch input value by passing the name of it return (
{errors.exampleRequired && This field is required}
Or
); }; export default Login;
